p: Currently, the most advanced vaccine approach to exploit the new knowledge on PC function is a live attenuated AD169 whole virion vaccine (V160), in which PC expression was restored by repairing a frameshift mutation in the UL131 gene [ 81]. A phase II clinical trial of V160 in healthy seronegative women is ongoing ( https://clinicaltrials.gov NCT03486834), while an mRNA based vaccine containing the PC and gB (mRNA-1647) is in a phase I trial ( https://clinicaltrials.gov NCT03382405).
